Name: Space Armor 2
About the game: 《Space Armor 2》 is a 3D Third-Person Shooting Game.The player was ordered to an energy star, to investigate the cause out of contact of base. Features: ☆ More than 20 weapons and armors. ☆ Great equipment upgrade system,full of strategy and fun. ☆ More than 50 creature,most of them are clever and dangerous. ☆ 6 unique Bosses:AI Robot Dragon Ice titan. ☆ Exquisite actions and amazing artwork. ☆ New character ranking system have never seen before.
